data.name: RefillBuyerTitleQuestion
data.value: Fill in the buyer's info again?

data.name: PropertiesFillingDialog_Text_Universal
data.value: Specify signatory, information about acceptance of shipped goods (works performed, services provided) and describe disagreements.

data.name: PropertiesFillingDialog_HasAuthority_Register
data.value: Person responsible for the deal closure

data.name: PropertiesFillingDialog_HasAuthority_DealAndRegister
data.value: Person who made the deal and is resp. for its closure

data.name: PropertiesFillingDialog_Text_UniversalCorrection
data.value: Specify signatory and information about acceptance of changes in price of shipped goods (works performed, services provided).

data.name: PropertiesFillingDialog_Text_Waybill
data.value: Specify signatory, information about acceptance of shipped goods and describe disagreements.

data.name: PropertiesFillingDialog_Text_Act
data.value: Specify signatory, information about acceptance of works performed or services provided.

data.name: PropertiesFillingDialog_AdjustmentResult_AgreedChanges
data.value: I agree with changes in price

data.name: PropertiesFillingDialog_Error_TIN
data.value: Specify TIN in the business unit card.

data.name: LastVersionWillBeChanged
data.value: Version {0} of the document (buyer's details) will be changed.

data.name: NewVersionWillBeCreated
data.value: New document version will be created.

data.name: FillBuyerInfoAwaited
data.value: Fill in buyer information if you want to specify some details about acceptance of goods (services)

data.name: ErrorBuyerTitlePropertiesFilling
data.value: An error occurred while saving buyer information.

data.name: FillBuyerInfoOutgoingDocument
data.value: You can fill in buyer information only if the document is incoming.

data.name: PropertiesFillingDialog_Error_AttorneyJobTitle
data.value: Specify job title of the employee who signed the power of attorney.

data.name: PropertiesFillingDialog_Error_AttorneyRegistration
data.value: Specify number and date of the power of attorney.

data.name: PropertiesFillingDialog_Error_OtherDocument
data.value: Cannot fill in buyer information. A signing authority with reason "Job description" or "Power of attorney" is required.

data.name: FillSellerInfoAwaited
data.value: Fill in seller information to specify extra details about the signatory

data.name: PropertiesFillingDialog_HasAuthority_DealAndRegisterAndInvoiceSignatory
data.value: Person resp. for deal and signing of tax inv.

data.name: PropertiesFillingDialog_HasAuthority_RegisterAndInvoiceSignatory
data.value: Person resp. for preparing and signing of tax inv.

data.name: LastVersionSellerTitleWillBeChanged
data.value: Version {0} of document (seller's info) will be changed.

data.name: RefillSellerTitleQuestion
data.value: Fill in the seller's info again?

data.name: NeedCancelRegistrationToChangeKind
data.value: To change document kind, cancel its registration.

data.name: ErrorSellerTitlePropertiesFilling
data.value: An error occurred when saving seller information.

data.name: PropertiesFillingDialog_HasAuthority_SignSchf
data.value: Person responsible for signing of tax invoices

data.name: PropertiesFillingDialog_HasAuthority_SignSchfAndRegister
data.value: Person resp. for deal closure and signing of tax invoices

data.name: PropertiesFillingDialog_Error_ConsigneePowersBaseGreaterMaxLength
data.value: Signing authority in the signature setting is more than {0} characters. Contact your system administrator.
